ezff.interfaces.qchem - Interface to QChem¶

Interface to Q-Chem, the ab initio quantum chemistry package

ezff.interfaces.qchem.read_ground_state(outfilename)[source]¶

Read-in a single converged structure from a QChem optimization run

Parameters:outfilename (str) – Filename for stdout from the QChem job
Returns:xtal tranjectory with a single snapshot with the converged structure and ground-state energy
ezff.interfaces.qchem.read_scan(outfilename, previous_scan=None)[source]¶

Read-in a multiple partially-converged structures from a PES scan (including bond-scans, angle-scans and dihedral-scans)

Parameters:
  • outfilename (str) – Filename for stdout from the QChem PES scan job
  • previous_scan (xtal trajectory) – xtal trajectory object from a previous scan, in case of continuation scans
Returns:

xtal trajectory object with structures and converged energies along the PES scan as individual snapshots
